ooC: Sorry Hottie, I kinda goofed while writing that one message. =\

Also, Rage can't reallly be twice as big as Megatron, but he can be 
slightly taller. Remember that Megatron was a rather large bot.

Megatron might not be exactly as he was at the end of BW, I might 
change his weapons slightly. ^^

|---Megatron---|

Megatron thinks to himself, ignoring the rabble around him, as they 
either go to work, or gather around him. His more immediate concerns 
are getting the ship back to a decent functionality, and to start 
energon mining.

He notes the several bots who enter the control room, and he frowns, 
the straglers would regret not following orders later. "I will not 
wait for the rest, if they survived anyway." He taps his fingers on 
the armpad. His eyes narrow as Rage speaks of him as being a 
disgrace, swiftly and quickly, Megatron's dragon head arm whips up 
and tries to grab Rage's head.
